attributes.action: Fix up the subway in Sydney grove before someone gets hurt!!
attributes.background: The subway is a disgrace for old and young people a complete health hazard. We pay taxes for something as disgusting as this. This link shows what I mean https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=1617936848498787&id=100008474628972

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This subway is the responsibility of Gateshead Council. You can submit a petition about the subway to Gateshead Council using the link below:

http://www.gateshead.gov.uk/Council%20and%20Democracy/GatesheadPetitionScheme.aspx 

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
